data.title: Ferranti Grantham on LinkedIn: #nerdiomanager #microsoftintune #azurevirtualdesktop
data.meta_description:
Another Nerdio MSP Foundations Training Camp in the books! This time at my favorite Microsoft office (so far) in downtown Toronto 🇨🇦 

Thank you to all the…
data.text:
I had a blast last week delivering at our Nerdio MSP Foundations training camp in the Windy City of Chicago! Where are we headed next? Glad you asked, there’s a whole lot more to come in July! Join us at any of our upcoming camps for an exciting two-day session on technical sales, AVD, Microsoft Intune and taking your cloud practice to the next level with Nerdio Manager for MSP. If you’re an MSP, come see what all the buzz is about! Join us here: https://lnkd.in/e9G_nJgw July 17 & 18 | Vancouver 🇨🇦 This week the talented Chris Plouffe, Rolando Jimenez and Mehdi Sebbane will be hosting our training camp in Vancouver. July 24 & 25 | Dublin 🇮🇪 The week after, Will Ominsky and I are taking a trip across the pond for our Dublin training camp, in partnership with MicroWarehouse Ltd. July 31 & August 1 | Detroit 🇺🇸 We’ll round out the month with a visit to Motor City for our MSP Foundations camp in Detroit, hosted by Chris Plouffe and Rolando Jimenez. #Microsoft #NerdioManager #NMM #NerdioManagerForMSP #AVD #AzureVirtualDesktop #MSP #ManagedServiceProvider #NerdioTrainingCamp

In just 15 days Nerdio will be heading to Dublin 🇮🇪 for a two-day training camp! We’ll discuss building a cloud practice - from technical selling all the way to adopting, enabling and managing your customers over time with the power of Nerdio Manager for MSP. Whether you’re new to AVD and Intune or just looking for the next steps to get more from your own existing cloud practice, there’s something for everyone here! A big thanks to our friends at MicroWarehouse Ltd for collaborating with us on this event! #Azurevirtualdesktop #AVD #MicrosoftIntune #Intune #NerdioManager #NerdioManagerforMSP

Some bonus action shots from this week’s Nerdio MSP Training Camp in Toronto! 🖥️ Yours truly talking through some very exciting developments around hardened images, courtesy of our friends at the Center for Internet Security. 💼 The very talented Will Ominsky sharing pro tips and tricks on good MSP sales practice and the tech to know to drive results. 🏞️ Bonus: The view that made Toronto my favorite Microsoft office. Shoutout to Rolando Jimenez for catching these moments!

It is a genuine honor to get to work with such talented people at such a forward thinking company. Since joining Nerdio a little over a year ago, I’ve learned and continue to learn so much from my colleagues and players in the cloud space every day. Cheers everyone! What an incredible milestone!🎉 I can’t wait to see and be a part of what’s next!

Managing an AVD deployment for an Enterprise? Well, do I have good news for you! Nerdio launched the first of our Enterprise Foundations Training Camps in Washington D.C. today! This one-day event is packed full of best practices, tips and tricks to help you simplify your administration and management of AVD at scale. Are you ready to get the most out of Nerdio Manager for Enterprise? Sign up to attend an event in a city near you - we can’t wait to see you there! https://lnkd.in/e_ZP_Kh5

Last month the Nerdio team got together for our annual kickoff meeting and I was surprised, humbled and honored to receive the Rookie of the Year award. This award means a lot to me - not just for the group recognition itself, but also because it reflects the relationships I’ve built with my peers and leaders throughout the company over the last nine months. A special shoutout to Michele Spirk for introducing me to Nerdio and to Carl Long, Kevin Murray, Tony Cai ☁, and Will Ominsky for being wonderful mentors and collaborators. Here’s to 2024🎉 - the name of the game is to keep the momentum going and to keep doing great things!
